title: Will a Rito employee will you play with me for me 1000th normal win?
body: Hey, Im just about to hit my thousandth normal win (at 990 rn), and Im wondering if a RIot employee will play with me for that game? I should have it within the next day or so. Thanks!

replies.body: Ayyyyyy we on the social media would love to try and get this fun little thing going again! Hit me back up in a reply (make sure it's a reply or I may not be notified) when you've hit 1000 and I'll see who else I can grab to play a game mode of your choice!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MOc0t9El,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-15T01:09:34.129+0000)
>
> Ayyyyyy we on the social media would love to try and get this fun little thing going again! Hit me back up in a reply (make sure it's a reply or I may not be notified) when you've hit 1000 and I'll see who else I can grab to play a game mode of your choice!

Not sure if I did this right...Soooo. Bump?

Didn't forget about you yet bruh ^_^! We're going to be setting this up soon, and you should have gotten a friend request from someone with a similar name to mine in the client. We'll get the game going there!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MOc0t9El,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-15T01:09:34.129+0000)

http://prntscr.com/gmbnsv !!! just hit it! Im ready to play whenever possible today :D
